qas.question: In what novel was The Times featured as an organ of a totalitarian ruling party?
What is the name of the author of Nineteen Eighty-Four?
What kind of future world did George Orwell create in his novel, Nineteen Eighty-Four?

context: In the <a2_0>dystopian<a2_0/> future world of <a1_0>George Orwell<a1_0/>'s <a0_0>Nineteen Eighty-Four<a0_0/>, The Times has been transformed into the organ of the totalitarian ruling party, its editorials—of which several are quoted in the book—reflecting Big Brother's pronouncements.
